Games.name: Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas
Games.changelog: This has CLEO for iOS pre-installed, so you can download mods and play GTA at 60 FPS.
Games.description: With iPogo you get a full set of tools to help you be the best. iPogo is a Simple, Powerful and Intuitive App.

Games.name: Flappy Bird
Games.description: This is an extremely close clone to the original Flappy Bird by Dong Nguyen.
